alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 8:41PM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to 1 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
